title: Wettability Index Data Schema
description: Wettability is the ability of one fluid to spread on or adhere to (that is, maintain contact with) a solid surface in the presence of other immiscible fluids. Typically, this is measured as water/oil interaction with a rock sample.

SamplesAnalysisID.title: Samples Analysis ID
SamplesAnalysisID.description: The OSDU Identifier for this SamplesAnalysis.

SampleID.title: Sample ID
SampleID.description: The OSDU Identifier for the Sample associated with this analysis.

items.title: Frame of Reference Meta Data Item
items.description: A meta data item, which allows the association of named properties or property values to a Unit/Measurement/CRS/Azimuth/Time context.

kind.title: UOM Reference Kind
kind.description: The kind of reference, 'Unit' for FrameOfReferenceUOM.

name.title: UOM Unit Symbol
name.description: The unit symbol or name of the unit.

persistableReference.title: UOM Persistable Reference
persistableReference.description: The self-contained, persistable reference string uniquely identifying the Unit.

unitOfMeasureID.description: SRN to unit of measure reference.

propertyNames.title: UOM Property Names
propertyNames.description: The list of property names, to which this meta data item provides Unit context to. A full path like "StructureA.PropertyB" is required to define a unique context; "data" is omitted since frame-of reference normalization only applies to the data block.

kind.title: CRS Reference Kind
kind.description: The kind of reference, constant 'CRS' for FrameOfReferenceCRS.

persistableReference.title: CRS Persistable Reference
persistableReference.description: The self-contained, persistable reference string uniquely identifying the CRS.

propertyNames.title: CRS Property Names
propertyNames.description: The list of property names, to which this meta data item provides CRS context to. A full path like "StructureA.PropertyB" is required to define a unique context; "data" is omitted since frame-of reference normalization only applies to the data block.

kind.title: DateTime Reference Kind
kind.description: The kind of reference, constant 'DateTime', for FrameOfReferenceDateTime.

name.title: DateTime Name
name.description: The name of the DateTime format and reference.

persistableReference.title: DateTime Persistable Reference
persistableReference.description: The self-contained, persistable reference string uniquely identifying DateTime reference.

propertyNames.title: DateTime Property Names
propertyNames.description: The list of property names, to which this meta data item provides DateTime context to. A full path like "StructureA.PropertyB" is required to define a unique context; "data" is omitted since frame-of reference normalization only applies to the data block.

kind.title: AzimuthReference Reference Kind
kind.description: The kind of reference, constant 'AzimuthReference', for FrameOfReferenceAzimuthReference.

name.title: AzimuthReference Name
name.description: The name of the CRS or the symbol/name of the unit.

persistableReference.title: AzimuthReference Persistable Reference
persistableReference.description: The self-contained, persistable reference string uniquely identifying AzimuthReference.

propertyNames.title: AzimuthReference Property Names
propertyNames.description: The list of property names, to which this meta data item provides AzimuthReference context to. A full path like "StructureA.PropertyB" is required to define a unique context; "data" is omitted since frame-of reference normalization only applies to the data block.

WettabilityIndexData.title: Wettability Index Data
WettabilityIndexData.description: Object capturing wettability index data, conditions, saturations, volumes, etc.

CapillaryPressureAnalysisID.title: Capillary Pressure Analysis ID
CapillaryPressureAnalysisID.description: OSDU ID for the Capillary Pressure Analysis referenced in this Wettability Analysis.

ForcedImbibedBrineVolume.title: Forced Imbibed Brine Volume
ForcedImbibedBrineVolume.description: The volume of forced imbibed brine, displacing water, expressed as fraction of pore volume with no confining pressure applied.

ForcedImbibedOilVolume.title: Forced Imbibed Oil Volume
ForcedImbibedOilVolume.description: The volume of forced imbibed oil, displacing water, expressed as fraction of pore volume with no applied confining pressure.

Temperature.title: Temperature
Temperature.description: The temperature at which the wettability index measurements are conducted.

InitialBrineSaturation.title: Initial Brine Saturation
InitialBrineSaturation.description: The initial amount of brine saturation in the sample before wettability tests are performed.

InitialOilSaturation.title: Initial Oil Saturation
InitialOilSaturation.description: The initial amount of oil saturation in the sample before wettability tests are performed.

SpontaneousImbibedBrineVolume.title: Spontaneous Imbibed Brine Volume
SpontaneousImbibedBrineVolume.description: The volume of spontaneous imbibed brine, displacing oil, expressed as fraction of pore volume with no confining pressure applied.

DisplacedOilVolume.title: Displaced Oil Volume
DisplacedOilVolume.description: The volume of oil displaced by brine.

BrineImbibitionBrineSaturation.title: Brine Imbibition Brine Saturation
BrineImbibitionBrineSaturation.description: volume of brine saturation during brine imbibition, fraction percent of the pore volume

BrineDisplacementOilSaturation.title: Brine Displacement Oil Saturation
BrineDisplacementOilSaturation.description: volume of oil saturation during brine displacement, expressed in fraction of pore volume

SpontaneousImbibedOilVolume.title: Spontaneous Imbibed Oil Volume
SpontaneousImbibedOilVolume.description: volume of spontaneously imbibed oil, displacing brine, expressed as fraction of pore volume. no confining pressure applied

OilImbibitionBrineSaturation.title: Oil Imbibition Brine Saturation
OilImbibitionBrineSaturation.description: volume of brine saturation during oil imbibition, expressed as fraction of pore volume

DisplacedBrineVolume.title: Displaced Brine Volume
DisplacedBrineVolume.description: volume of brine displaced by oil, fraction percent of the pore volume

DisplacementRatio.title: Displacement Ratio
DisplacementRatio.description: The ratio of the volume of fluid displaced by the wetting phase to the volume of fluid displaced by the non-wetting phase.

OilImbibitionOilSaturation.title: Oil Imbibition Oil Saturation
OilImbibitionOilSaturation.description: volume of oil saturation during oil imbibition, expressed as fraction of pore volume

WettabilityIndex.title: Wettability Index
WettabilityIndex.description: The wettability index is typically determined using laboratory experiments, such as capillary pressure measurements, or through specialized tests like the Amott-Harvey or USBM (United States Bureau of Mines) methods.

items.title: Wettability Index
items.description: The wettability index is typically determined using laboratory experiments, such as capillary pressure measurements, or through specialized tests like the Amott-Harvey or USBM (United States Bureau of Mines) methods.

WettabilityIndexTypeID.title: Wettability Index Type ID
WettabilityIndexTypeID.description: The type of wettability index reported, e.g. AmottHarvey or USBM.

ConfiningPressure.title: Confining Pressure
ConfiningPressure.description: The pressure applied to the sample during wettability index measurements to simulate reservoir conditions.

DesaturationMethod.title: Desaturation Method
DesaturationMethod.description: The technique used to remove oil or water from the sample to prepare it for wettability testing.

InjectionFluidID.title: Injection Fluid ID
InjectionFluidID.description: Fluid introduced to a sample during wettability index testing, e.g. Mercury.

DisplacedFluidID.title: Displaced Fluid ID
DisplacedFluidID.description: Fluid produced or displaced from a sample during wettability index testing, e.g. Brine, Hexane, or LiveCrudeOil.

FluidSystem.title: Fluid System
FluidSystem.description: The type of fluids used in the wettability tests, such as water and oil, to determine the wettability index.

InitialWaterSaturation.title: Initial Water Saturation
InitialWaterSaturation.description: The initial water saturation expressed as a fraction of the pore volume.

InitialCapillaryPressure.title: Initial Capillary Pressure
InitialCapillaryPressure.description: The capillary pressure of the sample before any fluid displacement or imbibition occurs.

ForcedWaterImbibition.title: Forced Water Imbibition
ForcedWaterImbibition.description: The process of measuring wettability by forcing water into the sample under controlled conditions.

ForcedOilImbibition.title: Forced Oil Imbibition
ForcedOilImbibition.description: The process of measuring wettability by forcing oil into the sample under controlled conditions.

Remarks.title: Remarks
Remarks.description: Array object capturing remarks or additional information for this test step.  Remarks for the analysis as a whole should be captured in the associated SamplesAnalysis work product component.

items.title: AbstractRemark
items.description: A remark object, pairing a remark text with a source, e.g. an author, and a date, which is typically included in an array. The RemarkSequenceNumber acts as unique key in this case.

RemarkSequenceNumber.title: Remark Sequence Number
RemarkSequenceNumber.description: A unique identifier for each remark record. This identifier is used to uniquely identify a member in an array of remarks.

Remark.title: Remark
Remark.description: A descriptive comment for this remark.

RemarkSource.title: Remark Source
RemarkSource.description: The person, vendor, interpreter or other provider of information.

RemarkDate.title: Remark Date
RemarkDate.description: The date the remark was issued.
